# Configure [BIRD](https://bird.network.cz/) via Bundlewrap

## Example Config
```python
node = {
    'bundles': [
        'bird',
    ],
    'metadata': {
        'main_interface': 'eth0',
        'interfaces': {
            'eth0': {
                'ip_addresses': ['203.0.113.1'],
                'netmask': '255.255.255.0',
            },
            'eth1': {
                'ip_addresses': ['198.51.100.1'],
                'netmask': '255.255.255.0',
            },
        },
        'bird': {
            # 'router_id': '', # Will be generated by metadata.py from main_interface
            'as': '64496',
            'protocols': {
                'direct': {
                    'testnet2': {
                        'interface': 'eth1',
                    },
                },
                'bgp': {
                    'peer1': {
                        'ip': '192.0.2.1',
                        'as': '64511',
                        'export': 'all',
                        'import': 'all',
                    },
                },
        },
    },
}
```
